about_the_game:
In Preview DLC you will find preview videos for all characters from the game. I created this DLC, because videos use a lot of disc space and like this the game will not be so heavy.

Thanks to the video preview you will see how this or that character looks like and will decide if you want to add them in your game or not.

All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, in the Play mode you see the list of characters . Just put your mouse on the character you like, and the preview video will appear.

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. You will get all updates for free.

Please post images, ideas, notes and suggestions regarding the 18+ content in the Telegram group "bestpcgamesforfun" (You can find link to it, on the right side as "Visit the website"), because Steam does not allow public discussions of any 18+ content.

content_descriptors.notes: In this DLC you will find preview videos for all characters from the game, on video characters are naked.

name: Preview for Sci-fi builder

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later (64-BIT Required!!!) It is not working on 32-BIT systems!
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Preview for Sci-fi builder - preview videos for all characters from the game. Thanks to the video preview you will see how this or that character looks like and will decide if you want to add them in your game or not.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
